We Sell Pumps

We sell, maintain, service and repair all major pump brands

Pumps For Sale

We have a large stock of new, used and refurbished submersible pumps ready for sale or hire.

Contact us with your requirements and we will find the best pump for you.

Pumps Ready To Sell

Based in the North East of England, We have a large stock of new, used and refurbished submersible pumps ready for sale or hire.

We can also repair and test your own pump in our fully equipped workshops. Mechanical seals supplied and fitted. End suction pumps also sourced and supplied.

We have pumps ready to go if yours is down and you need an urgent replacement. We also provide site services and breakdown cover of required. Please contact us for further info. Our business is built on meeting whatever service you require.
